name: Skarin
bio: 'Tubby kitty at heart! A big snuggler that enjoys his nap and lap time! Tiger is his brother.'

name: Tiger
bio: 'A very vocal kitty! Always on the lookout for snacks and scratches! Skarin is his brother.'

name: Tripp
bio: 'Tripp is a Long-Haired Dachshund. He can be very timid at first, but is super jumpy when given attention!'

name: Harley
bio: 'Harley is a Shepherd Terrier mix. She enjoys her alone time, but food time is her favorite time!'
